full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL DKAR GYI TSE SGRUB BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYASM PA GLING GA TSOGS CHEN DGE BSGOS DKA' BCU SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR DANG DBU MDZAD RAB @005B 'BYAMS PA TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG SOGS KYI RIM 'GROR PHRAL DU TSE SGRUB DGOS SGO BAS TSOGS PA'I ZHAL 'DON DU 'KHYER BDE BA 'DRE DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO,, ,,)
